content: MIAMI A U.S. standards-setting body said it would investigate New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc  in the wake of a Reuters report that detailed allegations of academic fraud at the company.
name: New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc
title: Exclusive: U.S. standards council to investigate New Oriental after Reuters report

content: * New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc - Says appointed Chenggang Zhou  company's current president  as CEO of New Oriental
name: New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc
title: BRIEF-New Oriental announces management change
